text:
I head up the development team here at Blend in the UK, and we're looking to hire <https://blendb2b.recruitee.com/o/front-end-web-developer-3845k-reading-remote-ukeurope|HubSpot developers> (Â£38-45k) either UK based, or remote (UK working hours +/-).

We're a friendly and supportive team spread over Reading, Lithuania, Ukraine (:heart:) and the US. We have some <https://www.blendb2b.com/work|quality work>, and frequently appear in the Inspire gallery. We've got some big ambitions for where we're going next, and if you'd like to be a part of it, please have a look at our <https://www.blendb2b.com/careers|careers page>.

_(no agencies)_
